name: Ragon Systems
overview:
Ragon Systems is Noida based IT, embedded systems and wireless service provider company. Here we work in embedded products development like safety alarms, security systems, home automation and corporate training, development & testing on new generation wireless technologies like 3G-UMTS, 4G-LTE, LTE-Advanced, VoIP, IMS and software development, application development, testing & Support, server implementation & support, web designing & development.

Ragon Systems has expertise in wireless technologies like wireless protocol stack development & testing (3G-UMTS, 4G-LTE), VoIP, IMS. Ragon Systems has experience in software development and testing services in various domains like .Net, JAVA, PHP. Embedded product development like safety alarms, security systems and home automation. Software Testing, Networking and network management, Web-based solutions in PHP, J2EE, .Net.
